conclusion: The problem involves a circular coil with given parameters and asks for the maximum power consumed by an external resistor.
Plan to calculate maximum power using induced EMF, total resistance, and power formula.
The image shows a circular coil with 200 turns, area 1 m^2, resistance 10 Ω, connected in series with a 50 Ω resistor, in a uniform magnetic field.
The graph shows magnetic induction B varying over time, with B changing from 0.2 T to 0.4 T at t = 4 s.
Change in magnetic induction ΔB is 0.2 T.
Induced EMF ΔE is 40 V calculated using N x S x ΔB.
Total resistance R_total in the circuit is 60 Ω.
Maximum power P consumed by R is 26.67 W using the power formula.
Maximum power consumed by R is confirmed to be 26.67 W.
